title: Lucy Mecklenburgh glows as baby moon continues with hunky fiance Ryan Thomas

Lucy Mecklenburgh has looked absolutely incredible throughout her pregnancy run so far.

And she has continued to share flawless snaps while soaking up the last of the sun on her final holiday before she welcomes her newborn son.

She has maintained her very slender physique since announcing her pregnancy a few months back, and is enjoying every last moment of the journey with fiance Ryan Thomas .

Taking to Instagram , the Results With Lucy star is rocking a deep plunge black bodysuit tucked into a silky zebra print maxi skirt as she poses up a storm in huge chair on their balcony.

The star has accessorised with fashionable gold hoops, a chunky watch and dark shades as she rests her hand behind her head.

(Image: Instagram)

(Image: Instagram)

Serving up pregnancy looks to her followers, she captioned the photo: "When u want to show off your new outfit.. u sit on the balcony and ‘act natural’"

Lucy was flooded with kind comments from followers who are appreciative of her pregnancy glow.

(Image: Instagram)

One praised: "You look so well! Pregnancy suits you" and another gushed: "So beautiful just love your style always so chic even when pregnant".

A third quipped: "I never looked that good pregnant, or in fact ever! you look incredible Lucy. Xxx"

Lucy and Ryan are staying at five-star hotel Anantara Vilamoura Algarve Resort, which offers deluxe rooms with contemporary style, a huge garden and aqua pool, fairway views and rooftop panoramas.

(Image: Instagram)

Back in September, the couple decided to shun the traditional gender reveal party, in favour of something much more candid.

Taking to Instagram, they confirmed their exciting news.

"Blue is for.......?" Ryan wrote in the caption, confirming they are expecting a son together.

(Image: Instagram)

Ryan's brother Adam Thomas joined the throng of fans congratulating the happy couple.

"Dreams really do come true!!," wrote the Love Island star.

Mum-to-be Lucy also took to Instagram to share a video of them finding out the news.

(Image: lucymeck1/Instagram)

The clip shows the ex Towie star opening up an envelope to read the results out loud to Ryan - who could not contain his excitement.

"It's a boy? It's a boy!" cried Ryan, who then threw his arms around his girlfriend and burst into tears.

"I just knew it was that. It's not a surprise to me," said Lucy. "I can't get my head around it. It's so weird."

Ryan then showered Lucy in kisses and screamed out "Oh yes!" repeatedly.
description: Lucy Mecklenburgh proves it's possible to look good when pregnant as she posts yet another glowing snap
